descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listId.ai_hint: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

entityId.name: entityId
entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list
entityId.ai_hint: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: organizations
options.description: Organizations that the person is associated with. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

listEntryId.name: listEntryId
listEntryId.description: The unique ID of the list entry object to be deleted
listEntryId.ai_hint: The unique ID of the list entry object to be deleted

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The domain name of the organization
domain.ai_hint: The domain name of the organization

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: firstName
options.description: The first name of the person

options.name: lastName
options.description: The last name of the person

options.name: organizations
options.description: Organizations that the person is associated with. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
term
options.description: A string used to search all the persons in your team’s address book. This could be an email address, a first name or a last name.

options.name: withInteractionDates
options.description: Whether interaction dates will be present on the returned resources

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the person
firstName.ai_hint: The first name of the person

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.description: The last name of the person
lastName.ai_hint: The last name of the person

emails.name: emails
emails.description: The email addresses of the person
emails.ai_hint: The email addresses of the person

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'listEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'entityId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'listEntryId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'listEntry' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'listEntryId'
IF resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'emails'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'emails'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
